channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Shenzhen University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: CRAYM: Neural Field Optimization via Camera RAY Matching
item.description: CRAYM: Neural field optimization via camera RAY matching enhances 3D reconstruction by using camera rays, not pixels, improving both novel view synthesis and geometry.

item.title: EGonc : Energy-based Open-Set Node Classification with substitute Unknowns
item.description: EGonc, a novel energy-based open-set node classification method, leverages substitute unknowns and energy scores to achieve superior accuracy and robustness in classifying nodes from known classes whi…

item.title: Motif-oriented influence maximization for viral marketing in large-scale social networks
item.description: Motif-oriented influence maximization tackles viral marketing’s challenge of reaching groups by proving a greedy algorithm with guaranteed approximation ratio and near-linear time complexity.

item.title: Reconstruct and Match: Out-of-Distribution Robustness via Topological Homogeneity
item.description: Reconstruct & Match (REMA) enhances deep learning’s out-of-distribution robustness by leveraging object’s topological homogeneity, outperforming state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Towards Combating Frequency Simplicity-biased Learning for Domain Generalization
item.description: This paper introduces novel data augmentation modules that dynamically adjust the frequency characteristics of datasets, preventing neural networks from over-relying on simple frequency-based shortcut…
